ValidationRule.description: An Opportunity can only be cancelled if it was Closed Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cancelled"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Won")), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.Users_Exclusion,$User.Username)), RecordTypeId == $CustomMetadata.Constant__mdt.FinleapConnectStandardSales_RecordTypeId.value__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunities can only be cancelled if it was Closed Won.
